page.title: 20Sport in Fordingbridge.
page.content:
In 1928, the{Bowling Club}was formed. The club plays in the New Forest League and individual players have won county honours. The{Fordingbridge Hockey Club}was re-formed 21 years ago. It holds an Annual Six-a-side Tournament. {Sandleheath Tennis Club}was founded in 1920. The team competes in the Hampshire League.
The following have contributed to the compilation of these items: Ann Bailey Katie Bailey Carolyn Barker Richard Baxendale Michaela Emm Julian Lamb Darryl Langford Andrew Ledger Jessie Pierce Barry Pollitt Jonathan Rust Jenny Shucksmith Gary Sibthorpe Rachel Tague Andrew Tapper Lisa Warr Elizabeth Willmott Lucy Young.
